actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that expired unused investment credits shall be treated as refundable overpayments of tax.

summary.text: Provides that expired unused investment credits shall be treated as refundable overpayments of tax under the Internal Revenue Code if applied for on or before March 15 (April 15 in the case of a person other than a corporation) of the succeeding taxable year.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that expired unused investment credits shall be treated as refundable overpayments of tax.
